file_content.text: Hello, my lord. Our water's safe from those foul pirates thanks to your victory.
Forever grateful, sir. Our water supply's safe thanks to you.
Water's flowing, and the pirates are nowhere to be seen. Can't thank you enough.
You found the water! Thank you, I--I don't know what to say.
This harvest belongs to the people of Tatooine. I'll see that it's handed out freely, a sign of solidarity, our willingness to fight back.
Never expected an offworlder to help like this. We won't forget what you've done here.
Get those pirates! Take back the water they stole from us!
Welcome! You look like you've been around. Our water shortage could use talent like you.
Incredible, a real Jedi in this sand pit. We've got a water problem, could use your assistance.
Soldier! You're a welcome sight. We're running out of water and could use a gun or two.
Huh, a professional spacer in this wasteland? I'd offer you a drink, but our water supply's running out.
Name's Dester. Moisture farmer. Most important job there is on this dustball.
Water's everything here. Harvest it with the vaporators, sell what we don't need. Made a good living before the pirate attacks.
What pirates?
Pirates?
Filthy thieves who steal our water and mark up the price to sell on the black market.
They'll keep preying on you if you don't stop them.
Defend yourself, then.
How? Ask nicely? We've got no weapons. They steal our water, then mark up the price to sell on the black market.
Life's never easy.
All too true.
Bad as it is though, people prefer extortion to losing precious water shipments in a skirmish.
We'll dry up and die, they keep us in this choke hold. Please, help us survive if you've the means to.
I'll do anything in my power to recover your water.
The water will be yours again.
You're too kind, Jedi. Thank you.
You won't go thirsty on my watch.
I'll get you your water.
Thank you, soldier. Glad you're on board.
I won't even waste the water it would take to break a sweat.
Consider it done.
Ha! That's the spirit!
Fine. What do I have to do?
Here are the containers. Anything you can do may make the difference between life and death.
You do it. [Refuse quest]
Oh. I see. Guess we'll take care of ourselves, as usual.
Sorry. Don't have any water for sale.
